info.title: Anime unofficial Multi-Source API
info.description:
### About
- **Telegram**: [vhaRasc](https://t.me/vharasc)
- **Telegram**: [noe999x](https://t.me/pozvion)
- **GitHub**: [noe999x](https://github.com/noe999x/Rest-API)

### Supported Platforms
1. **Oploverz**
2. **Samehadaku**
3. **Kusonime**
4. **Anoboy**
5. **LayarAnime**
6. **NimeGami**
7. **Nekopoi**
8. **Komiku**
9. **Doujindesu**
10. **AdultComic V1**
11. **AdultComic V2**

### Message 
- Nothing

get.description: Get anime list in alphabetical order

parameters.name: type

schema.description: tv | ova | movie | live+action | special | bd | ona | music
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: tv | ova | movie | live+action | special | bd | ona | music

parameters.name: order

schema.description: title | titlereverse | update | latest | popular | rating
schema.title: Order

parameters.description: title | titlereverse | update | latest | popular | rating

Advanced anime list with custom filters

schema.description: Type: TV | OVA | ONA | Special | Movie
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: Type: TV | OVA | ONA | Special | Movie

parameters.name: order

schema.description: Order: title | titlereverse | update | latest | popular
schema.title: Order

parameters.description: Order: title | titlereverse | update | latest | popular

get.description: Get anime from home (Latest, Recommendation, Top Series)

parameters.name: type

schema.description: TV Series | OVA | Movie | Live Action | ...
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: TV Series | OVA | Movie | Live Action | ...

get.description: Get detailed info about an anime
Get video stream and episode details, use episode slug, not anime slug
Get home page content from LayarAnime
Get home page content with pagination
Get latest donghua episodes with pagination
Get latest anime episodes with pagination
Get all available genres and themes
Get anime list by genre with pagination
Get anime list by genre. Use full slug including 'theme/' for themes.
Get anime list by country with pagination
Get ongoing anime list with pagination
Get completed anime list with pagination
Get anime movie list with pagination
Get streaming servers and downloads, use episode slug, not title slug
Get streaming links, downloads, and details
Get latest episodes and JAV updates
Get 3D Hentai category list. Penggunaan slug 3D Hentai digunakan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`, tidak bisa melalui endpoint `nekopoi/detail`
Get 2D Animation category list. Penggunaan slug 2D Hentai digunakan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`, tidak bisa melalui endpoint `nekopoi/detail`
Get JAV category list. Penggunaan slug JAV langsung digunakan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`, tidak bisa melalui endpoint `nekopoi/detail`
Get JAV Cosplay category list. Penggunaan slug JAV Cosplay langsung digunakan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`, tidak bisa melalui endpoint `nekopoi/detail`
Get text-based list of all Hentai Series
Get text-based list of all JAV Series. Penggunaan slug JAV langsung digunakan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`, tidak bisa melalui endpoint `nekopoi/detail`

Get anime series details (synopsis, metadata, episode list). Penggunaan endpoint `nekopoi/detail` khusus untuk slug kategori Hentai yang memiliki jumlah episode, jika slug adalah `xxx-episode-1-subtitle-indonesia` maka digunakan/diteruskan pada endpoint `nekopoi/watch`

Get specific episode streams and downloads. Penggunaan endpoint `nekopoi/watch` digunakan untuk slug episode kategori Hentai kemudian kategori 2D Hentai, 3D Hentai, JAV, dan JAV Cosplay, [usage: `one-piece-episode-1-subtitle-indonesia`]
Get Ranking, Popular (Manga/Manhwa/Manhua), and Latest updates

parameters.name: sorttime

schema.description: daily, weekly, all (only works with orderby=meta_value_num)
schema.title: Sorttime

parameters.description: daily, weekly, all (only works with orderby=meta_value_num)

get.description: Get detailed information about a manga
Get latest updates (Doujin, Manhwa, Manga, Eroge) and Popular lists
Get popular and latest adult comics.

parameters.name: type

schema.description: all | manhwa | manga | doujin | comic | novel
schema.title: Type

parameters.description: all | manhwa | manga | doujin | comic | novel

parameters.name: order

schema.description: default | title | titlereverse | update | popular | added
schema.title: Order

parameters.description: default | title | titlereverse | update | popular | added
